output:
You said sometime you want to lose the ties that bind.
I said hold on, no one makes it on their own.
I'll be forever your friend.
I will see you yet again.
I will see you yet again.
I will see you yet again.
You said you'd need to spread your wings and break free.
I said okay, we'll meet again someday.
I'll be forever your friend.
I will see you yet again.
I won't be blue.
I can only wish the best for you.
But when you leave, please don't look back at me.
Don't look back at me.
Don't look back at me.
Don't look back at me.
